Package golden.raspberry.awards.core.application.service

Class ListenerAdapter

java.lang.Object
golden.raspberry.awards.core.application.service.ListenerAdapter
@Component public class ListenerAdapter extends Object
Main listener service providing access to orchestration patterns.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Luiz Generoso
